page.title: 18 SCHOOLS
page.content: Uttoxeter's schools are organised in a 3-tier system with 3 First schools for 5-9 year olds feeding into one of 2 middle schools(for 9-13 year olds)where the town children are joined by youngsters from the nearby villages .At 13, everyone transfers to Alleyne's High School where you have to stay until you are 16,or 18 if you wish to take further exams.Roman Catholic children have their own school in town which they attend up to the age of 11 when they go to Cheadle,9 miles away. Uttoxeter has 7 churches and chapels catering for a variety of Denominations For recreation,Uttoxeter has a new indoor swimming pool and squash courts,a Cinema and Bingo Hall and numerous pubs and clubs.
